org.mongojack.internal.util
Interface IdHandler<K,D>

All Known Implementing Classes:
IdHandler.JacksonIdHandler, IdHandler.NoopIdHandler
public interface IdHandler<K,D>

Handler for ids. Converts them between the objects type and the database type

1.0
Author:
James Roper
